ENGLISH :

6-Month Internship - Digital : e-commerce, media, social media and innovation - July 2026

The Opportunity

At L'Or√©al, your potential is what truly matters!

Depending on your profile, you could join one of our four divisions within the Digital hub, which is reinventing our consumers' experience. We create ultra-personalized, tailor-made beauty solutions, driven by the power of BeautyTech, data insights, and Artificial Intelligence.

Our former interns say it best! "From my very first day as an intern, I was directly immersed in the heart of the action. Collaborating with teams from diverse backgrounds was a unique opportunity to step out of my comfort zone. I quickly grasped the concrete impact of my work and the key role of digital in transforming our brands."

So, ready to live the L'Or√©al experience?

Your Missions:
  • E-Commerce : Contribute to optimizing our online sales strategies, manage product catalogs, and analyze consumer behavior to boost sales growth.
  • Online Brand Management (OBM) : Collaborate with marketing teams to design and implement digital campaigns that strengthen our brands' online presence and image.
  • Data Analysis (Analytics) : Dive deep into data to extract key insights, measure campaign effectiveness, and provide concrete recommendations to inform decision-making.
  • Digital Project Management : Support the planning and execution of digital campaigns, from their conception and content development, to cross-functional coordination to ensure seamless and successful implementation.
  • Digital Services & Innovation : Contribute to the development of cutting-edge digital tools, services, and experiences, aimed at enhancing client engagement.

Your Profile
  • You are a Master's student, on a gap year, or in your final internship year.
  • You are fluent in English or French, as you will be evolving within an international team.
  • You are passionate about the digital world (e-commerce, digital marketing, data analysis) and proficient in common computer tools, including the Microsoft Suite.
  • You are proactive, curious, rigorous, and organized. You possess strong analytical and synthesis skills, excellent communication abilities, and are recognized for your creativity.
  • Beyond technical skills, we are primarily seeking individuals with strong potential, an entrepreneurial spirit, and the ability to challenge the status quo.

Benefits
  • Compensation: €1700 gross monthly
  • Transportation: 60% of travel costs covered
  • Remote Work: 1 day of remote work per week
  • Leave: 1 day per month

L'Or√©al Group Perks
  • Access to L'Or√©al Learning Platform to boost your development ( 7 pillars for success in e-commerce, Developing your direct e-commerce value triangle)
  • Staff Sales at preferential rates
  • Friends & Family flash sales for your close ones
  • And depending on the campus: Gym & Concierge services.


The Recruitment Process
  • Recruiter Interview - 30 min: To introduce yourself and discuss the position & the L'Or√©al Group.
  • Meeting with your potential future manager - 45 min: To discuss the role's missions.

The L'Or√©al Group

As the world's leading beauty group, we operate in 150 countries with 37 international brands across 4 divisions: Consumer Products, Professional Products, Dermatological Beauty, and Luxe.

At L'Or√©al, we create beauty that acts, inspires, and unites. Our mission is to invent the future of beauty by combining the best of technology, science, and natural inspiration, offering everyone inclusive, responsible, and future-oriented beauty.

And because equal opportunities and diversity are strong values within the Group, as a beauty leader, we consider every application.

Regardless of your gender identity, sexual orientation, visible and/or invisible disability(ies), social or cultural background, health status, age, religion, or any other element that makes you unique, our teams will carefully review your profile.

* Experience with APIs, JSON, and basic scripting.
    
* Strong problem-solving mindset ‚Äî curious, resourceful, and autonomous.
    
* Genuine interest in AI, LLMs, and automation.
    
* Good communication skills ‚Äî able to explain technical concepts clearly.
    
* Professional proficiency in English (written and spoken).
    

### Nice-to-have

* Either (more than one will be greatly appreciated):
    
    * Familiarity with SecOps tools (SIEM, EDR, CTI, Firewalls, NDR, IAM, etc.).
        
    * Familiarity with IT (ITSM, CLM, Helpdesk, ‚Ä¶).
        
    * Familiarity with BizOps (CRM, Productivity, Project management, Collaboration tools, Data analytics and reporting tools‚Ä¶).
        
* Side projects that show a builder mindset.
    
* Basic programming skills.
    
* Active on social networks, sharing insights on AI and automation.
    

* * *

### What you will learn

* Solution architecture for enterprise AI automation.
    
* Agentic workflows, Autonomous Agents, and AI protocols.
    
* Enterprise-grade SecOps, IT and Business automation.
    
* Advanced prompt engineering and swarm of AI agents with LLMs.
    
* Deliver and present live demos; craft compelling technical narratives; create impactful sales assets.
    
* Life inside a fast-growing startup: product discovery, agile rituals, and customer interactions.

title: Responsable Admission et Placement F/H
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

Vous avez :

  • un goût pour la vente, la relation client et les objectifs commerciaux

  • une très bonne capacité d’écoute active et de compréhension des besoins

  • une aisance téléphonique. Vous fêtes dynamique et avez une certaine capacité à convaincre

  • beaucoup de rigueur dans l’application des consignes de vente

  • une expérience dans un poste commercial ou de relation client appréciée

  • Idéalement vous maîtrisez les outils digitaux (CRM, téléphonie, etc.)

 

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

  • Nous avons une politique concrète de promotion interne et un parcours de carrière défini pour les équipes commerciales. Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers un autre processus de vente, du management, un autre département, un autre pays…
  • Nous proposons des CDI de 35 heures et nous engageons à favoriser l’équilibre de vie pro-perso de nos collaborateurs;
  • Nos équipes sont très diversifiées, essentiellement d'un point de vue métier (ingénierie pédagogique, production audiovisuelle, IT, vente à distance, marketing etc.). A l'intersection entre une entreprise tech et une boîte de production, vous pourrez découvrir chez Walter Learning des métiers différents;
  • Walter Learning est présent dans plusieurs grands centres urbains, dans des bureaux modernes et toujours très bien localisés;
  • Nous proposons à tous nos collaborateurs d’accéder en illimité à l’ensemble de notre catalogue de formations.

 

Déroulement des entretiens

  • Rencontre avec un membre de l’équipe RH
  • Rencontre avec un team leader
  • Rencontre avec un associé

title: Commercial B to C F/H
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

Passionné.e de challenge, persévérant.e, dynamique et force de conviction, nous recherchons avant tout des personnes motivées avec :

  • Une aisance orale (une expérience téléphonique est un plus) et une maîtrise parfaite du français
  • L’envie d’apprendre et de vous dépasser
  • Un fort esprit d’équipe
  • Une culture du chiffre et de l'atteinte des objectifs

Enfin, le sens de l’écoute et du conseil est indispensable à ce poste pour accompagner au mieux nos apprenants !

 

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

 

  • Tous nos commerciaux sont formés en théorie et pratique lors de leur intégration ainsi que pendant toute la durée de leur carrière chez Walter Learning grâce à une équipe de formateurs dédiés. Tout est mis en oeuvre pour accompagner les commerciaux dans l'atteinte de leurs objectifs.
  • Nous avons une politique concrète de promotion interne et un parcours de carrière défini pour les équipes commerciales accompagné d'une évolution de salaire fixe régulière. Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers un poste "Senior" puis "Expert", un autre processus de vente, du management, un autre département, un autre pays… ;
  • Les primes sur objectifs de vente sont déplafonnées. C'est à dire que si l'objectif est dépassé, votre variable mensuel sera également augmenté ;
  • Nous proposons des CDI de 35 heures du lundi au vendredi et nous engageons à favoriser l’équilibre de vie pro-perso de nos collaborateurs ;
  • Walter Learning est présent dans plusieurs grands centres urbains, dans des bureaux modernes et toujours très bien localisés ;
  • Pour la grande majorité des postes, il est possible de choisir son lieu de travail entre les différents bureau de walter learning. Il est également possible de changer de lieu de travail définitivement ou ponctuellement ;
  • Nous proposons à tous nos collaborateurs d’accéder en illimité à l’ensemble de notre catalogue de formations.

title: Commercial B to C F/H
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

Passionné.e de challenge, persévérant.e, dynamique et force de conviction, nous recherchons avant tout des personnes motivées avec :

  • Une aisance orale (une expérience téléphonique est un plus) et une maîtrise parfaite du français
  • L’envie d’apprendre et de vous dépasser
  • Un fort esprit d’équipe
  • Une culture du chiffre et de l'atteinte des objectifs

Enfin, le sens de l’écoute et du conseil est indispensable à ce poste pour accompagner au mieux nos apprenants !

 

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

 

  • Tous nos commerciaux sont formés en théorie et pratique lors de leur intégration ainsi que pendant toute la durée de leur carrière chez Walter Learning grâce à une équipe de formateurs dédiés. Tout est mis en oeuvre pour accompagner les commerciaux dans l'atteinte de leurs objectifs.
  • Nous avons une politique concrète de promotion interne et un parcours de carrière défini pour les équipes commerciales accompagné d'une évolution de salaire fixe régulière. Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers un poste "Senior" puis "Expert", un autre processus de vente, du management, un autre département, un autre pays… ;
  • Les primes sur objectifs de vente sont déplafonnées. C'est à dire que si l'objectif est dépassé, votre variable mensuel sera également augmenté ;
  • Nous proposons des CDI de 35 heures du lundi au vendredi et nous engageons à favoriser l’équilibre de vie pro-perso de nos collaborateurs ;
  • Walter Learning est présent dans plusieurs grands centres urbains, dans des bureaux modernes et toujours très bien localisés ;
  • Pour la grande majorité des postes, il est possible de choisir son lieu de travail entre les différents bureau de walter learning. Il est également possible de changer de lieu de travail définitivement ou ponctuellement ;
  • Nous proposons à tous nos collaborateurs d’accéder en illimité à l’ensemble de notre catalogue de formations.

title: Sales Operations & Automation Manager
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

### **üìå What you‚Äôll own/Example Missions**

### 1\. Operations & Systems

* Build and maintain workflows using **HubSpot, Zapier / Make / n8n**
    
    * **HubSpot ‚Üî Telegram** (routing, reminders, notifications) and/or maintaining and optimizing our service providers helping us on this
        
    * **Typeform ‚Üí HubSpot** (structured data collection and auto-updated fields)
        
* **Operational & accounting support:** payments (FIAT & crypto), invoicing, reporting, payroll/multisig ops, and Pennylane workflow optimization (invoice sync & reconciliation).
    
* **Sales / Finance / Ops data alignment** ensuing CRM data quality is as per the SOPs, create process SOPs, and document end-to-end processes (steps, tools, and handoffs).
    
* Product Operations such as CEX API testing, wallets & CEX accounts support.
    

### 2\. Client & Partner Management

* Act as the main **administrative point of contact post-deal**, ensuring clients (TI) and partners (CEX, MM and others) are kept informed throughout the campaign lifecycle
    
* Manage **post-closing account support** via async channels (Telegram, email), providing updates on campaign performance, timelines, and deliverables ‚Äî **no sales calls, negotiations, or renewals ownership (subject to evolve)**
    
* Handle **contract administration**: signature coordination, document tracking, and confirmation of fund reception/tx test
    
* Set up and maintain **automated follow-ups, reminders, and lifecycle status updates** to support the sales team
    
* Support the organization of **IRL events** involving the Cede team, partners, and clients
    
* Support PR and other inbound initiatives in order to grow the closing opportunities of Cede and brand awareness (registering to event‚Äôs speaker applications, pushing articles on medias, ‚Ä¶)
    

### 3\. CRM, Reporting & Insights

* Maintain clean, actionable CRM data (CRM updates, invoice matching, documentation, etc.)
    
    * Creating Dashboards, reporting, analyzing sales tread identification, take actions based on data driven insights
        
    * Automation of CRM updates, data entry, and invoice matching
        
    * Support the sales team in maintaining an updated **CRM and internal dashboards** (client status, campaign lifecycle, reporting)
        

You‚Äôll have a **360¬∞ view of how a crypto startup operates** ‚Äî from strategic discussions to the nitty-gritty of keeping the engine running. If you enjoy problem-solving but are also comfortable with operations, detail-oriented work, this role will be a great fit.

### Requirements

* Strong English must be fluent (written + spoken, daily working language)
    
* Proven experience building automations for real business processes (not just experiments)
    
* Comfortable in Sales Ops / CRM operations (HubSpot preferred)
    
* Strong dashboarding / performance monitoring experience which is detail-oriented, structured, reliable, and fast at execution
    
* Ownership mindset you don‚Äôt wait for perfect instructions to move things forward with a high integrity and discretion with sensitive data
    
* Quick learner or basic understanding of Web3 ecosystem (CEXs, market makers, token issuers).
    
* Strong communication skills for a cross-team role, including clear written and verbal updates
    
* Excellent note-taking, summarization, and structured thinking skills
    

### **üòÉ**¬†Nice to have

* Experience with **accounting/financial tools** (Pennylane, Qonto, or equivalents).
    
* Familiarity with **Web3 / crypto operations** (trading, CEX ecosystem, token issuers and market making space).
    
* French proficiency.
    

### Diversity and Inclusion

At Cede, we actively encourage applications from women and individuals from diverse backgrounds‚Äîour culture celebrates openness, inclusion, and diversity in all its forms.

title: Sales & BD Representative
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

### **Mission**

* Reach:
    
    * Identify and engage potential acquisition funnels (Market Makers, Launchpads, VCs, CEX listing managers, Marketing companies,‚Ä¶) and clients (token issuers)
        
    * Establish outbound and inbound strategies depending on targeted personas
        
    * Build relationships with stakeholders (networking conferences, irl meetings,‚Ä¶)
        
* Nurturing:
    
    * Develop and maintain acquisition funnels for new inbound introductions
        
    * Understand and address client pain points and showcase our solution through case studies/testimonials
        
    * Develop our internal understanding of the market (ex: refine our client personas, wash trading case studies, CEX listing required KPIs, CEX delisting KPIs, ‚Ä¶)
        
* Closing:
    
    * Lead pricing discussions with prospects and tailor proposals to meet client needs
        
    * Work with our legal/operational team to draft contracts and initiate signing
        
    * Ensure we receive initial rewards and payments
        
* Post-closing:
    
    * Ensure the token issuer is satisfied with the launched campaign by gathering honest feedback. Act promptly to resolve any issues or concerns raised by the client.
        
    * Monitor liquidity performance on the exchange‚Äôs order books and ensure campaign goals are met.
        
    * Investigate underperforming campaigns by engaging power users and coordinating with market makers to adjust spreads and liquidity.
        
    * Prepare for new trading campaigns by:
        
        * Collaborating on social media posts and promotional activities.
            
        * Setting up trading rules and providing ongoing support for the partner‚Äôs social strategy.
            
    * Provide regular updates and reporting to clients on campaign results.
        
    * Community engagement with our traders userbase (daily interactions, feedback loop,‚Ä¶)
        

### **Outcomes**

We are looking for a **passionate and hungry sales/biz dev to help us:**

* Solidify relationships with our acquisition funnels and expand our sales pipeline
    
* Enhance our sales conversion rate
    
* Boost our MRR
    
* Grow our number of traders/participants
    

### Requirements

* **Web3 Knowledge:** A foundational understanding of Web3 concepts, including market makers (MM), CEX-DEX relationships, and token issuers' needs. Candidates should be able to grasp these concepts quickly, even if not deeply experienced.
    
* **Sales Experience:** Proven track record in sales, that will particularly help in managing and closing multi-week campaigns (3-4 weeks) that lead to recurring revenue (MRR/ARR) with Cede Labs.
    
* **Language Proficiency:** Fluency in English is essential, written and verbal communication skills.
    
* **Personality Traits:**
    
    * Energetic, approachable, and charismatic on calls. Must know how to sell themselves before selling the product. Building strong rapport with clients is key to securing deals and fostering long-term relationships.
        
    * Direct and persuasive, with the ability to guide clients toward solutions that align with their needs, even if the client is initially hesitant.
        
    * Hungry, competitive, willingness to be the best and push your KPIs and the company‚Äôs KPIs to the top
        
* **Availability and Organization:**
    
    * Willingness to work weekends during campaigns to accommodate client needs, such as adjusting goals, updating campaign parameters, or managing CEX integrations.
        
    * Highly organized, capable of managing multiple campaigns, scheduling calls, documenting interactions in CRM tools, and ensuring no delays in communication.
        

### ‚ò∫Ô∏è¬†Nice to have

* **Advanced Web3 Knowledge:** Deeper expertise in finance-related Web3 topics, including the operations of market makers and token dynamics.
    
* **Partnership Development Experience:** Background in building partnerships with key Web3 stakeholders like market makers, launchpads, or exchanges.
    
* **Multilingual Abilities:** Fluency in additional languages to cater to a global client base.
    
* **CRM Expertise:** Familiarity with CRM tools and systems to efficiently manage sales pipelines and client relationships.
    
* **Event Participation:** Experience in representing companies at industry events, panels, or hackathons to promote products and network with potential partners.

--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

Vous avez :

Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers un autre processus de vente, du management, un autre département, un autre pays…

A l'intersection entre une entreprise tech et une boîte de production, vous pourrez découvrir chez Walter Learning des métiers différents
  • Walter Learning est présent dans plusieurs grands centres urbains, dans des bureaux modernes et toujours très bien localisés

  • Rencontre avec un team leader

ENGLISH :

6-Month Internship - Digital : e-commerce, media, social media and innovation - January 2026

The Opportunity

At L'Or√©al, your potential is what truly matters!

Depending on your profile, you could join one of our four divisions within the Digital hub, which is reinventing our consumers' experience. We create ultra-personalized, tailor-made beauty solutions, driven by the power of BeautyTech, data insights, and Artificial Intelligence.

Our former interns say it best! "From my very first day as an intern, I was directly immersed in the heart of the action. Collaborating with teams from diverse backgrounds was a unique opportunity to step out of my comfort zone. I quickly grasped the concrete impact of my work and the key role of digital in transforming our brands."

So, ready to live the L'Or√©al experience?

Your Missions:
  • E-Commerce : Contribute to optimizing our online sales strategies, manage product catalogs, and analyze consumer behavior to boost sales growth.
  • Online Brand Management (OBM) : Collaborate with marketing teams to design and implement digital campaigns that strengthen our brands' online presence and image.
  • Data Analysis (Analytics) : Dive deep into data to extract key insights, measure campaign effectiveness, and provide concrete recommendations to inform decision-making.
  • Digital Project Management : Support the planning and execution of digital campaigns, from their conception and content development, to cross-functional coordination to ensure seamless and successful implementation.
  • Digital Services & Innovation : Contribute to the development of cutting-edge digital tools, services, and experiences, aimed at enhancing client engagement.

Your Profile
  • You are a Master's student, on a gap year, or in your final internship year.
  • You are fluent in English or French, as you will be evolving within an international team.
  • You are passionate about the digital world (e-commerce, digital marketing, data analysis) and proficient in common computer tools, including the Microsoft Suite.
  • You are proactive, curious, rigorous, and organized. You possess strong analytical and synthesis skills, excellent communication abilities, and are recognized for your creativity.
  • Beyond technical skills, we are primarily seeking individuals with strong potential, an entrepreneurial spirit, and the ability to challenge the status quo.

Benefits
  • Compensation: €1700 gross monthly
  • Transportation: 60% of travel costs covered
  • Remote Work: 1 day of remote work per week
  • Leave: 1 day per month

L'Or√©al Group Perks
  • Access to L'Or√©al Learning Platform to boost your development ( 7 pillars for success in e-commerce, Developing your direct e-commerce value triangle)
  • Staff Sales at preferential rates
  • Friends & Family flash sales for your close ones
  • And depending on the campus: Gym & Concierge services.


The Recruitment Process
  • Recruiter Interview - 30 min: To introduce yourself and discuss the position & the L'Or√©al Group.
  • Meeting with your potential future manager - 45 min: To discuss the role's missions.

The L'Or√©al Group

As the world's leading beauty group, we operate in 150 countries with 37 international brands across 4 divisions: Consumer Products, Professional Products, Dermatological Beauty, and Luxe.

At L'Or√©al, we create beauty that acts, inspires, and unites. Our mission is to invent the future of beauty by combining the best of technology, science, and natural inspiration, offering everyone inclusive, responsible, and future-oriented beauty.

And because equal opportunities and diversity are strong values within the Group, as a beauty leader, we consider every application.

Regardless of your gender identity, sexual orientation, visible and/or invisible disability(ies), social or cultural background, health status, age, religion, or any other element that makes you unique, our teams will carefully review your profile.

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

  • Nous avons une politique concrète de promotion interne et un parcours de carrière défini pour les équipes commerciales. Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers un autre processus de vente, du management, un autre département, un autre pays…
  • Nous proposons des CDI de 39 heures et nous engageons à favoriser l’équilibre de vie pro-perso de nos collaborateurs;

title: Ing√©nieur(e) p√©dagogique F/H
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

 

  • Expertise en gestion de projet, idéalement appliquée à la formation

  • Familiarité avec le monde de l'audiovisuel
  • Vous justifiez d'au moins 2 ans d'expérience dans ce domaine

 

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

  • Nous avons une politique concrète de promotion interne. Walter Learning grandit très vite. Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement encore plus vite, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers du management, un autre département, un autre pays…

A l’intersection entre une entreprise tech et une boîte de production, vous pourrez découvrir chez Walter Learning des métiers différents.

  • Pour la grande majorité des postes, il est possible de choisir son lieu de travail, particulièrement entre Marseille et Paris. Il est également possible de changer de lieu de travail définitivement ou ponctuellement.

  • Nous proposons à tous nos collaborateurs d’accéder en illimité à notre catalogue de formations

title: Senior Backend Engineer - Fintech
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

We're looking for a **senior Backend Engineer (TypeScript/Node.js)** with strong React skills who embodies both technical excellence and startup DNA.

### Technical Excellence:

**Backend-First Engineer:**

* Years of experience with TypeScript/Node.js backend development
    
* Strong understanding of backend architecture, APIs, and databases (PostgreSQL)
    
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS) and modern development practices
    
* Solid React/TypeScript skills for frontend work when needed
    
* Bonus: Previous fintech or payment systems experience
    

**Architecture & Craftsmanship (Must-have):**

* Strong SOLID design habits
    
* Can design and ship features end-to-end (scoping, decomposition, technical design)
    
* Hands-on with DDD (domain modeling, bounded contexts)
    
* Familiar with Clean Architecture / Hexagonal (Ports & Adapters) principles
    

### Startup DNA:

* High ownership mentality: You don't just code, you think about the business impact
    
* Thrives in uncertainty: You're energized by fast-changing priorities and ambiguous requirements
    
* Move fast, break things: You ship quickly, iterate based on feedback, and aren't afraid of making mistakes
    
* Excellence-driven: You have high standards for yourself and push others to be better
    
* **Bonus**: Previous High Level (semi-professional/professional) Athlete, Video-Games Player, Musician.
    

### Cultural Fit:

* **Direct communicator**: You speak up when something isn't working and propose solutions
    
* **Globally minded**: You understand we're building for entrepreneurs worldwide
    
* **Mission-driven**: You genuinely care about democratizing access to global commerce
    
* **Resilient**: Startup life is intense; lots of work, fast decisions, high stakes; you need to handle pressure and bounce back from setbacks
    

**Red Flags:**

* Needs constant direction or hand-holding
    
* Prefers stable, predictable environments
    
* Only cares about the paycheck, not the mission
    
* Can't handle constructive feedback or fast iteration
    

We're a small team where everyone has massive impact. If you want to build something that changes millions of lives while working with exceptional people, you're our person.

### Key Responsibilities:

**Backend Development (Primary Focus):**

* Build and maintain robust payment processing systems using TypeScript/Node.js (NestJS)
    
* Design and implement APIs that handle financial transactions securely and efficiently
    
* Create transaction routing algorithms that optimize for acceptance rates and fees
    
* Implement real-time messaging and event-driven architecture using CloudAMQP
    
* Apply DDD principles and Clean Architecture patterns to build maintainable, scalable systems
    

**Infrastructure & Scale:**

* Architect scalable database solutions using PostgreSQL for financial data
    
* Deploy and maintain cloud infrastructure on Render
    
* Ensure 99.9% uptime for mission-critical payment systems
    
* Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting for production systems
    

**Product & Strategy:**

* Collaborate directly with founders on product roadmap and technical decisions
    
* Research and integrate with multiple payment acquirers and financial institutions
    
* Contribute to technical documentation and API specifications
    

### Benefits:

**Financial:**

* Competitive salary
    
* Equity package
    
* Performance bonuses tied to company milestones
    

**Professional Growth:**

* Direct access to founders and key strategic decisions
    
* Work on cutting-edge fintech technology with global impact
    
* Small team environment where your contributions are immediately visible
    
* Opportunity to shape technical architecture from early stage
    

**Work Environment:**

* Hybrid Remote-friendly culture with flexible hours
    
* Modern tech stack and tools
    
* Fast-paced startup environment with rapid learning opportunities
    
* Minimal bureaucracy, focus on building and shipping
    

**Impact & Mission:**

* Every feature you build enables entrepreneurs worldwide to access global markets
    
* Be part of democratizing financial infrastructure for emerging economies
    
* Work on technology that processes real money and affects real businesses
    
* Join a well-funded startup ($1.1M raised) with strong investor backing and client demand
    

**Fair Warning:** This is intense startup life with high expectations, significant responsibility, and the need to move fast. Perfect for engineers who want extraordinary impact and compensation to match.

* **Adaptability:** You iterate quickly, embrace feedback, and continuously seek improvement for both the product and the way the team works.
    
* **Collaboration:** You proactively align, share context, and create a positive, solution-oriented environment.
    
* **Focus on value:** You challenge assumptions, prioritize based on impact, and ensure the team solves the most important problems.
    

**Your Profile to Make This a Success**

* **Experience:** 5-8 years as a Product Manager (or equivalent role) in a SaaS, B2B, or industrial-tech context.
    
* **User-centric mindset:** Strong ability to listen, analyze, and synthesize user needs‚Äîespecially in operational environments.
    
* **Data-informed:** Comfortable working with metrics, KPIs, and qualitative findings to drive decisions.
    
* **Structured & rigorous:** Capable of transforming complexity into clarity, with strong prioritization skills.
    
* **Collaborative:** You thrive in cross-functional environments and enj[o](https://www.welcomekit.co/dashboard/o/w9QNlLd/jobs/FABRI_LqaeqKR/edit/application_form)y aligning diverse stakeholders.
    
* **Technical curiosity:** You don‚Äôt need to code but you understand how products are built and can work efficiently with engineering teams.
    
* **Industry interest:** A genuine curiosity for industrial challenges, shop floor workflows, and operational excellence.
    
* **Execution-driven:** You can drive initiatives end-to-end and maintain momentum even in ambiguity.

title: Product Engineer AI
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

### What you‚Äôll do

You will own full product features end-to-end, with real autonomy and decision power.

In practice, you will:

* **Own features end to end** 
    You‚Äôll take product features from idea to rollout, with responsibility for decisions along the way.
    
* **Build practical features** 
    You‚Äôll work on AI-powered functionality recruiters actually use, such as interview reports, candidate evaluation support, signal surfacing, and small automations inside existing tools.
    
* **Make sense of messy problems** 
    You‚Äôll turn unclear business or user needs into clear product choices, deciding what should be explicit vs. implicit and how much detail is useful.
    
* **Understand our users and focus on real impact** 
    You‚Äôll prototype, iterate, and ship, then check what happened, usage, time saved, and whether it made recruiters‚Äô decisions easier.
    
* **Care about quality** 
    You‚Äôll pay attention to clarity, consistency, edge cases, and whether the product feels reliable and understandable.
    
* **Work closely with our team** 
    You‚Äôll collaborate closely between product and engineering, using fast feedback and real usage to guide improvements.
    

* * *

### Who we‚Äôre looking for

* We‚Äôre looking for a product-driven profile with an engineering background, able to build user experiences that are useful, credible, and actually adopted.
    
* You know the value of strong UX and product design approach. You‚Äôre able to prototype quickly to test ideas, and you care about building products that are simple, well-polished, and user friendly.
    
* You will do well in this role if you have strong product instincts and quickly spot what creates real user value. You focus on clarity and impact rather than adding complexity, and you‚Äôve already successfully shipped features to production.
    
* You‚Äôre comfortable working with AI (AI Coding Tools), iterating on accuracy, reliability, tone, and structure until the output feels right. While you also know when not to use it. You like having full ownership: understanding the problem deeply, proposing solutions, and improving them without waiting for detailed instructions.
    
* You have high standards. ‚ÄúGood enough‚Äù isn‚Äôt enough, and you tend to notice details others miss.
    
* Experience in a startup, scale-up, or founding team environment is a strong plus. We value autonomy, responsibility, and execution that‚Äôs driven by real impact.
    

* * *

### Why join Noota

* A product trusted by demanding customers and solving real-world problems
    
* High autonomy and ownership in a fast-growing, ambitious team
    
* The opportunity to shape core product decisions from day one
    
* A strong focus on impact, not just ideas

title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Founding Team)
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

### **What motivates you**

You were skeptical of AI coding tools at first.

You watched others widely overestimate the performance of these models and trust their result blindly.

But you saw the potential!

So you kept experimenting, testing new tools, new models, new workflows. You developed an intuition for when to intervene and how to build trust.

You experienced first hand the switch from a smart autocomplete to this alien technology and you're now obsessed with making it efficient, reliable and maximizing AI leverage.

### **Who we‚Äôre looking for**

You are a great fit if you are either:

* **A backend developer** with strong systems knowledge who can contribute to frontend development and DevOps.
    
* **A frontend developer** with an eye for UX and the ability to go dive into the backend when needed.
    

**Our stack:** We use **Bun**, **Deno**, **TypeScript, React, Python, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes.**

### **Qualifications:**

* Strong programming fundamentals and system design knowledge
    
* Proficient in TypeScript/React and Python
    
* Experience with modern web development practices and tools
    
* Proven track record of shipping production-ready code
    
* 3-5+ years of professional software development experience
    
* Familiarity with Python ML stack (PyTorch, HuggingFace, etc.) is a plus

Join our Sourcing Teams !

The Opportunity :

At L'Or√©al, your potential is what truly matters!

Joining L'Or√©al means above all discovering a true industrial company delivering more than 7 billion products worldwide every year.

By joining the Purchasing teams, you will deep dive in Operations, whose m√©tiers contribute to the growth of L'Or√©al, from product development, sourcing, production to the distribution of all the Group's products. As an ally of the brands, Operations always develops and seeks the most agile, innovative, efficient and responsible solutions to meet the specific requirements and diversity of consumers.

More precisely, you will have the chance to work within one of our wide variety of purchasing areas:

DIRECT PURCHASING
  • Raw materials: Various raw materials are used in the composition of formulas and the manufacture of products: polymers, natural ingredients, perfumes, sun filters, vitamins... L'Or√©al sources its raw materials from specialist suppliers, committed to the constant search for quality and safety.
  • Packaging: The purpose of packaging is to protect and enhance the product. For L'Or√©al, it is essential that our packaging is innovative and environmentally friendly.
  • Contract Manufacturing: In addition to its own in-house plants, the Group uses a panel of subcontracting companies for packaging or the manufacture of specific finished products (soaps, pencils, wipes...) and logistics services.


INDIRECT PURCHASING
  • Retail & Promotion: Promotion of products is a strategic area of communication for L'Or√©al brands. Point-of-sale advertising and promotional items are important ways of winning over consumers. They require creativity, innovation and a competitive edge from suppliers of multi-material POS displays (metal, plastic, wood, etc.), cardboard displays, boxes, printing (notices, book, etc.) and consumer gift accessories (luggage, textiles, accessories, etc.).
  • Marketing Services: Similarly, and as a complement to Retail and Promo, the brands rely on Marketing Services aimed at making the products known and accompanying the consumer at the point of sale. These include creative agencies, post-production, advertising space, and market research, not forgetting digital media.
  • Business Services: Various expenses are essential to the smooth running and development of the Group. These general and administrative expenses are all the costs incurred by L'Or√©al to carry out its activities, excluding production costs. In other words, they include all expenses related to Human Resources, Consulting, IT & Telecom, Facility Management & Utilities, Travel, Events, etc. This Purchasing area handles all expenses for L'Or√©al sites worldwide.
  • Industrial and Devices: In order to equip and operate the production lines of its factories around the world, L'Or√©al works on a daily basis with many industry suppliers specialized in manufacturing equipment, packaging machinery and industrial utilities.
  • Excellence Team: The role of the Excellence Team is to define the global purchasing strategy while working on common projects to the different areas. These teams work in particular on tools but also on projects guaranteeing the conformity of purchases at the international level.

Your Missions :
  • Develop purchases initiatives to optimize the costs and create value
  • Build and follow calls for tender
  • Participate in projects: Business Review, animation of the purchasing community, market studies, suppliers' mapping, and analysis of portfolio...
  • Come in support to the implementation and to the deployment of the strategy of the category
  • Set up key indicators and strengthen the purchasing data
  • And innovate, go further: bring your own ideas and impact!

.

Your Profile :
  • You are a master's student, taking a gap year, undertaking a final-year internship, and/or studying at an engineering school.
  • You have an aptitude for hands-on work and adapting to change. You know how to thrive in a challenging environment while communicating effectively.

As the world's leading beauty group, we operate in 150 countries with 37 international brands across 4 divisions: Consumer Products, Professional Products, Dermatological Beauty, and Luxe.

At L'Or√©al, we create beauty that acts, inspires, and unites. Our mission is to invent the future of beauty by combining the best of technology, science, and natural inspiration, offering everyone inclusive, responsible, and future-oriented beauty.

And because equal opportunities and diversity are strong values within the Group, as a beauty leader, we consider every application.

Regardless of your gender identity, sexual orientation, visible and/or invisible disabilities, social or cultural background, health status, age, religion, or any other element that makes you unique, our teams will carefully review your profile.

title: Product Designer
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

We need someone who can hit the ground running, seeks constant feedback and who sees design as a collaborative data-driven process to bring the best user experience to our users. You balance creative problem-solving with disciplined execution.

* 3+ years of product design experience, preferably in SaaS B2B environments.
    
* Proven track record of translating user insights into successful design solutions that drive business outcomes, portfolio to show for it.
    
* Excellent design craftsmanship with ability to quickly master new UI patterns and components and turn abstract ideas and complex data into clear, actionable UI solutions.
    
* Proficiency with modern design tools and rapid prototyping methods, design systems and component-based design.
    
* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to articulate design decisions and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
    
* Proactive at seeking and implementing feedback, balancing user needs with business imperatives and technical constraints, comfortable working directly with engineers.
    
* Comfortable juggling multiple projects and shifting priorities in a fast-paced environment.
    
* Eagerness to experiment with new tools, techniques and UI trends to keep our products fresh.
    
* Fluency in English (Both verbal and written). French and additional languages are a plus.
    

You are excited by rapid iteration, confident enough to challenge your assumptions with real data and energized by the challenge of reinventing product practices for the next generation of intelligent software, creating design patterns and methodologies that will be future-proof and industry-leading.

title: Formateur / Formatrice Titre Professionnel Assistant(e) Ressources Humaines (H/F) Contexte F/H
job_description:
--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

 

  • Expertise métier
    • Excellente connaissance du Titre Professionnel Assistant(e) Ressources Humaines dans son intégralité.
    • Expérience avérée en tant que :
      • Formateur(trice) sur le TP ARH et/ou
      • Membre de jury TP ARH (fortement apprécié).
    Compétences pédagogiques
    • Solides compétences en ingénierie pédagogique.
    • Maîtrise des dispositifs d’évaluation (ECF, examens blancs, dossiers professionnels).
    • Capacité à travailler en transversalité avec des équipes pédagogiques.
    Conditions impératives d'éligibilité administrative
     Toute candidature devra impérativement respecter les conditions suivantes :
    • Disposer d’un NDA (Numéro de Déclaration d’Activité) – obligatoire
    • Disposer d’un numéro SIRET
    • être une scructure certifiée Qualiopi OU être un formateur entrepreneur individuel au régime micro-social
    Modalités
    • Démarrage : selon disponibilité
    • Rythme : à définir selon les besoins pédagogiques
    • Rémunération : facturation à la prestation - Rémunération à la copie pour les corrections et à l'heure pour la conception.

 

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

  • Nous avons une politique concrète de promotion interne. Walter Learning grandit très vite. Rejoindre ce projet, c’est avoir l’opportunité de progresser professionnellement encore plus vite, en relevant des défis toujours plus grands et variés : évolution vers du management, un autre département, un autre pays…

  • Nous construisons un service de formation exceptionnel et aidons chaque année des milliers d’apprenants à prendre la main sur leur avenir professionnel. Notre produit porte l'ambition d'une formation professionnelle pertinente, utile et agréable. Nous investissons massivement pour proposer l'excellence à nos apprenants.

  • Nos équipes sont très diversifiées, essentiellement d’un point de vue métier (ingénierie pédagogique, production audiovisuelle, tech, vente à distance, marketing etc.). A l’intersection entre une entreprise tech et une boîte de production, vous pourrez découvrir chez Walter Learning des métiers différents.

  • Pour la grande majorité des postes, il est possible de choisir son lieu de travail, particulièrement entre Marseille et Paris. Il est également possible de changer de lieu de travail définitivement ou ponctuellement.

  • Nous proposons à tous nos collaborateurs d’accéder en illimité à notre catalogue de formations

title: Head of Content at Favikon (CDI)

--- PROFIL RECHERCHE ---

**Non-Negotiables:**

* You're obsessed with AI tools and constantly testing new ones (seriously, if you're not already using ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, Runway, ElevenLabs, and experimenting with the latest AI writing, video, and research tools, this isn't for you)
    
* Native or near-native English writing ability (our market is global, our content needs to be flawless); French is a huge asset, Spanish, Portuguese and Arabic are a nice plus
    
* Deep understanding of how content works differently across LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube, and X (you don't just post the same thing everywhere)
    
* You actually use these platforms personally and understand their cultures, memes, and unwritten rules
    
* Deep curiosity about the creator economy, social platforms, and how influence works
    
* You can write and create for different audiences and formats without losing your voice (from CMOs on LinkedIn to Gen Z creators on TikTok)

**Ideal Background:**

* 2+ years in content leadership roles, preferably in SaaS, creator economy, or marketing tech (alternances or any junior role counts if you delivered)
    
* Proven experience building audiences on at least 2-3 major platforms (bonus if you've actually grown your own following)
    
* Track record of building content programs that drove real business results (leads, signups, brand awareness)
    
* Experience working in fast-paced, high-growth startups where you wore multiple hats
    
* Understanding of SEO, content distribution, platform algorithms, and growth marketing
    
* Comfortable with video content creation and editing (or managing those who do it)
    
* Comfortable with data and analytics (we measure everything)
    
* Bonus points if you understand the technical side of how platforms rank and distribute content
    

**Personality Fit:**

* You get energized by moving fast and iterating based on feedback
    
* You're not precious about your work but you care deeply about quality
    
* You challenge ideas (including mine) when you think there's a better way
    
* You're comfortable with ambiguity and figure things out as you go
    
* You're genuinely curious about everything (how things work, why people make decisions, what's changing in the world, why a TikTok went viral)
    
* You scroll through social media and see patterns, not just entertainment
